description: As global cases rise by record numbers, EU leaders struggle to reach a deal on a recovery package.
title: Coronavirus: Third day of wrangling over huge EU recovery plan
title_page: Coronavirus: Third day of wrangling over huge EU recovery plan - BBC News
maintext: But nations including Italy and Spain are desperate to revive their shattered economies, and have accused the EU of not doing enough to help countries hit by the pandemic. Italy in particular was one of the earliest European countries to suffer an outbreak and has recorded 35,000 deaths - one of the highest tolls in the world.
